name: Zombies World Life...
description:
The game of “Zombies Lifeline” will happen in some small town. Viruses broke out in the town, and zombies are over the place. In order to survive, the protagonist Jack and Anton need to help each other, and start a life traveling which is fraught with danger.

The player need to make every option to help them solve every kind of challenges and keep away from danger, or you will be engulfed by lots of zombies.

The way to play the game, you will proceed your communication by words, the every step you take is very important. In the game, there is an inhumane Dr. Zombie. He tries to control every body, and make all of them to be his slaves. Could you use your intelligence to break away from his control? Of course, there also is a cute girl who was trapped with the zombies. She is anticipating your arrival, can you save her?
Life? Or death? You have the final say!!!
